013package org.apache.juneau.rest.httppart;
014
015import static java.util.stream.Collectors.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartType.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
020import java.util.*;
021import java.util.stream.*;
022
023import jakarta.servlet.http.*;
024
025import org.apache.http.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.http.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.http.part.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
033import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
034import org.apache.juneau.rest.util.*;
035import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
036
037/**
038 * Represents the parsed form-data parameters in an HTTP request.
039 *
040 * <p>
041 *    The {@link RequestFormParams} object is the API for accessing the HTTP request content as form data.
042 *    It can be accessed by passing it as a parameter on your REST Java method:
043 * </p>
044 * <p class='bjava'>
045 *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>(...)
046 *    <jk>public</jk> Object myMethod(RequestFormParams <jv>formData</jv>) {...}
047 * </p>
048 *
049 * <h5 class='figure'>Example:</h5>
050 * <p class='bjava'>
051 *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>(...)
052 *    <jk>public</jk> Object myMethod(RequestFormParams <jv>formData</jv>) {
053 *
054 *       <jc>// Get query parameters converted to various types.</jc>
055 *       <jk>int</jk> <jv>p1</jv> = <jv>formData</jv>.get(<js>"p1"</js>).asInteger().orElse(0);
056 *       String <jv>p2</jv> = <jv>formData</jv>.get(<js>"p2"</js>).orElse(<jk>null</jk>);
057 *       UUID <jv>p3</jv> = <jv>formData</jv>.get(<js>"p3"</js>).as(UUID.<jk>class</jk>).orElse(<jk>null</jk>);
058 *     }
059 * </p>
060 *
061 * <p>
062 *    Note that this object does NOT take GET parameters into account and only returns values found in the content of the request.
063 * </p>
064 *
065 * <p>
066 *    Some important methods on this class are:
067 * </p>
068 * <ul class='javatree'>
069 *    <li class='jc'>{@link RequestFormParams}
070 *    <ul class='spaced-list'>
071 *       <li>Methods for retrieving form data parameters:
072 *       <ul class='javatreec'>
073 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#contains(String) contains(String)}
074 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#containsAny(String...) containsAny(String...)}
075 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#get(Class) get(Class)}
076 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#get(String) get(String)}
077 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#getAll(String) getAll(String)}
078 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#getFirst(String) getFirst(String)}
079 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#getLast(String) getLast(String)}
080 *       </ul>
081 *       <li>Methods overridding form data parameters:
082 *       <ul class='javatreec'>
083 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#add(NameValuePair...) add(NameValuePair...)}
084 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#add(Part) add(Part)}
085 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#add(String,Object) add(String,Object)}
086 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#addDefault(List) addDefault(List)}
087 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#addDefault(NameValuePair...) addDefault(NameValuePair...)}
088 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#addDefault(String,String) addDefault(String,String)}
089 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#remove(String) remove(String)}
090 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#set(NameValuePair...) set(NameValuePair...)}
091 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#set(String,Object) set(String,Object)}
092 *       </ul>
093 *       <li>Other methods:
094 *       <ul class='javatreec'>
095 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#asQueryString() asQueryString()}
096 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#copy() copy()}
097 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#isEmpty() isEmpty()}
098 *       </ul>
099 *    </ul>
100 * </ul>
101 *
102 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
103 *    <li class='jc'>{@link RequestFormParam}
104 *    <li class='ja'>{@link org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.FormData}
105 *    <li class='ja'>{@link org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.HasFormData}
106 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HttpParts">HTTP Parts</a>
107 * </ul>
108 */
109public class RequestFormParams extends ArrayList<RequestFormParam> {
110
111   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
112
113   private final RestRequest req;
114   private boolean caseSensitive;
115   private HttpPartParserSession parser;
116   private final VarResolverSession vs ;
117
118   /**
119    * Constructor.
120    *
121    * @param req The request creating this bean.
122    * @param caseSensitive Whether case-sensitive name matching is enabled.
123    * @throws Exception Any exception can be thrown.
124    */
125   public RequestFormParams(RestRequest req, boolean caseSensitive) throws Exception {
126      this.req = req;
127      this.caseSensitive = caseSensitive;
128      this.vs = req.getVarResolverSession();
129
130      Map<String,String[]> m = null;
131      Collection<Part> c = null;
132
133      RequestContent content = req.getContent();
134      if (content.isLoaded() || ! req.getHeader(ContentType.class).orElse(ContentType.NULL).equalsIgnoreCase("multipart/form-data"))
135         m = RestUtils.parseQuery(content.getReader());
136      else {
137         c = req.getHttpServletRequest().getParts();
138         if (c == null || c.isEmpty())
139            m = req.getHttpServletRequest().getParameterMap();
140      }
141
142      if (m != null) {
143         for (Map.Entry<String,String[]> e : m.entrySet()) {
144            String name = e.getKey();
145
146            String[] values = e.getValue();
147            if (values == null)
148               values = new String[0];
149
150            // Fix for behavior difference between Tomcat and WAS.
151            // getParameter("foo") on "&foo" in Tomcat returns "".
152            // getParameter("foo") on "&foo" in WAS returns null.
153            if (values.length == 1 && values[0] == null)
154               values[0] = "";
155
156            if (values.length == 0)
157               values = new String[]{null};
158
159            for (String value : values)
160               add(new RequestFormParam(req, name, value));
161         }
162      } else if (c != null) {
163         c.stream().forEach(this::add);
164      }
165   }
166
167
168   /**
169    * Copy constructor.
170    */
171   private RequestFormParams(RequestFormParams copyFrom) {
172      req = copyFrom.req;
173      caseSensitive = copyFrom.caseSensitive;
174      parser = copyFrom.parser;
175      addAll(copyFrom);
176      vs = copyFrom.vs;
177   }
178
179   /**
180    * Subset constructor.
181    */
182   private RequestFormParams(RequestFormParams copyFrom, String...names) {
183      this.req = copyFrom.req;
184      caseSensitive = copyFrom.caseSensitive;
185      parser = copyFrom.parser;
186      vs = copyFrom.vs;
187      for (String n : names)
188         copyFrom.stream().filter(x -> eq(x.getName(), n)).forEach(this::add);
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Sets the parser to use for part values.
193    *
194    * @param value The new value for this setting.
195    * @return This object.
196    */
197   public RequestFormParams parser(HttpPartParserSession value) {
198      this.parser = value;
199      forEach(x -> x.parser(parser));
200      return this;
201   }
202
203   /**
204    * Sets case sensitivity for names in this list.
205    *
206    * @param value The new value for this setting.
207    * @return This object (for method chaining).
208    */
209   public RequestFormParams caseSensitive(boolean value) {
210      this.caseSensitive = value;
211      return this;
212   }
213
214   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
215   // Basic operations.
216   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
217
218   /**
219    * Adds default entries to these parameters.
220    *
221    * <p>
222    * Similar to {@link #set(String, Object)} but doesn't override existing values.
223    *
224    * @param pairs
225    *    The default entries.
226    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
227    * @return This object.
228    */
229   public RequestFormParams addDefault(List<? extends NameValuePair> pairs) {
230      for (NameValuePair p : pairs) {
231         String name = p.getName();
232         Stream<RequestFormParam> l = stream(name);
233         boolean hasAllBlanks = l.allMatch(x -> Utils.isEmpty(x.getValue()));
234         if (hasAllBlanks) {
235            removeAll(getAll(name));
236            add(new RequestFormParam(req, name, vs.resolve(p.getValue())));
237         }
238      }
239      return this;
240   }
241
242   /**
243    * Adds default entries to these parameters.
244    *
245    * <p>
246    * Similar to {@link #set(String, Object)} but doesn't override existing values.
247    *
248    * @param pairs
249    *    The default entries.
250    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
251    * @return This object.
252    */
253   public RequestFormParams addDefault(NameValuePair...pairs) {
254      return addDefault(alist(pairs));
255   }
256
257   /**
258    * Adds a default entry to the form data parameters.
259    *
260    * @param name The name.
261    * @param value The value.
262    * @return This object.
263    */
264   public RequestFormParams addDefault(String name, String value) {
265      return addDefault(BasicStringPart.of(name, value));
266   }
267
268   /**
269    * Adds a parameter value.
270    *
271    * <p>
272    * Parameter is added to the end.
273    * <br>Existing parameter with the same name are not changed.
274    *
275    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
276    * @param value The parameter value.
277    * @return This object.
278    */
279   public RequestFormParams add(String name, Object value) {
280      Utils.assertArgNotNull("name", name);
281      add(new RequestFormParam(req, name, Utils.s(value)).parser(parser));
282      return this;
283   }
284
285   /**
286    * Adds request parameter values.
287    *
288    * <p>
289    * Parameters are added to the end.
290    * <br>Existing parameters with the same name are not changed.
291    *
292    * @param parameters The parameter objects.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
293    * @return This object.
294    */
295   public RequestFormParams add(NameValuePair...parameters) {
296      Utils.assertArgNotNull("parameters", parameters);
297      for (NameValuePair p : parameters)
298         if (p != null)
299            add(p.getName(), p.getValue());
300      return this;
301   }
302
303   /**
304    * Adds a parameter value.
305    *
306    * <p>
307    * Parameter is added to the end.
308    * <br>Existing parameter with the same name are not changed.
309    *
310    * @param part The parameter part.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
311    * @return This object.
312    */
313   public RequestFormParams add(Part part) {
314      Utils.assertArgNotNull("part", part);
315      add(new RequestFormParam(req, part).parser(parser));
316      return this;
317   }
318
319   /**
320    * Sets a parameter value.
321    *
322    * <p>
323    * Parameter is added to the end.
324    * <br>Any previous parameters with the same name are removed.
325    *
326    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
327    * @param value
328    *    The parameter value.
329    *    <br>Converted to a string using {@link Object#toString()}.
330    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
331    * @return This object.
332    */
333   public RequestFormParams set(String name, Object value) {
334      Utils.assertArgNotNull("name", name);
335      set(new RequestFormParam(req, name, Utils.s(value)).parser(parser));
336      return this;
337   }
338
339
340   /**
341    * Sets request header values.
342    *
343    * <p>
344    * Parameters are added to the end of the headers.
345    * <br>Any previous parameters with the same name are removed.
346    *
347    * @param parameters The parameters to set.  Must not be <jk>null</jk> or contain <jk>null</jk>.
348    * @return This object.
349    */
350   public RequestFormParams set(NameValuePair...parameters) {
351      Utils.assertArgNotNull("headers", parameters);
352      for (NameValuePair p : parameters)
353         remove(p);
354      for (NameValuePair p : parameters)
355         add(p);
356      return this;
357   }
358
359   /**
360    * Remove parameters.
361    *
362    * @param name The parameter names.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
363    * @return This object.
364    */
365   public RequestFormParams remove(String name) {
366      Utils.assertArgNotNull("name", name);
367      removeIf(x -> eq(x.getName(), name));
368      return this;
369   }
370
371   /**
372    * Returns a copy of this object but only with the specified param names copied.
373    *
374    * @param names The list to include in the copy.
375    * @return A new list object.
376    */
377   public RequestFormParams subset(String...names) {
378      return new RequestFormParams(this, names);
379   }
380
381   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
382   // Convenience getters.
383   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
384
385   /**
386    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the parameters with the specified names are present.
387    *
388    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
389    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the parameters with the specified names are present.
390    */
391   public boolean contains(String name) {
392      return stream(name).findAny().isPresent();
393   }
394
395   /**
396    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the parameter with any of the specified names are present.
397    *
398    * @param names The parameter names.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
399    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the parameter with any of the specified names are present.
400    */
401   public boolean containsAny(String...names) {
402      Utils.assertArgNotNull("names", names);
403      for (String n : names)
404         if (stream(n).findAny().isPresent())
405            return true;
406      return false;
407   }
408
409   /**
410    * Returns all the parameters with the specified name.
411    *
412    * @param name The parameter name.
413    * @return The list of all parameters with the specified name, or an empty list if none are found.
414    */
415   public List<RequestFormParam> getAll(String name) {
416      return stream(name).collect(toList());
417   }
418
419   /**
420    * Returns all headers with the specified name.
421    *
422    * @param name The header name.
423    * @return The stream of all headers with matching names.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
424    */
425   public Stream<RequestFormParam> stream(String name) {
426      return stream().filter(x -> eq(x.getName(), name));
427   }
428
429   /**
430    * Returns all headers in sorted order.
431    *
432    * @return The stream of all headers in sorted order.
433    */
434   public Stream<RequestFormParam> getSorted() {
435      Comparator<RequestFormParam> x;
436      if (caseSensitive)
437         x = Comparator.comparing(RequestFormParam::getName);
438      else
439         x = (x1,x2) -> String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER.compare(x1.getName(), x2.getName());
440      return stream().sorted(x);
441   }
442
443   /**
444    * Returns all the unique header names in this list.
445    * @return The list of all unique header names in this list.
446    */
447   public List<String> getNames() {
448      return stream().map(RequestFormParam::getName).map(x -> caseSensitive ? x : x.toLowerCase()).distinct().collect(toList());
449   }
450
451   /**
452    * Returns the first parameter with the specified name.
453    *
454    * <p>
455    * Note that this method never returns <jk>null</jk> and that {@link RequestFormParam#isPresent()} can be used
456    * to test for the existence of the parameter.
457    *
458    * @param name The parameter name.
459    * @return The parameter.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
460    */
461   public RequestFormParam getFirst(String name) {
462      Utils.assertArgNotNull("name", name);
463      return stream(name).findFirst().orElseGet(()->new RequestFormParam(req, name, null).parser(parser));
464   }
465
466   /**
467    * Returns the last parameter with the specified name.
468    *
469    * <p>
470    * Note that this method never returns <jk>null</jk> and that {@link RequestFormParam#isPresent()} can be used
471    * to test for the existence of the parameter.
472    *
473    * @param name The parameter name.
474    * @return The parameter.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
475    */
476   public RequestFormParam getLast(String name) {
477      Utils.assertArgNotNull("name", name);
478      Value<RequestFormParam> v = Value.empty();
479      stream(name).forEach(x -> v.set(x));
480      return v.orElseGet(() -> new RequestFormParam(req, name, null).parser(parser));
481   }
482
483   /**
484    * Returns the last parameter with the specified name.
485    *
486    * <p>
487    * This is equivalent to {@link #getLast(String)}.
488    *
489    * @param name The parameter name.
490    * @return The parameter value, or {@link Optional#empty()} if it doesn't exist.
491    */
492   public RequestFormParam get(String name) {
493      List<RequestFormParam> l = getAll(name);
494      if (l.isEmpty())
495         return new RequestFormParam(req, name, null).parser(parser);
496      if (l.size() == 1)
497         return l.get(0);
498      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(128);
499      for (int i = 0, j = l.size(); i < j; i++) {
500         if (i > 0)
501            sb.append(", ");
502         sb.append(l.get(i).getValue());
503      }
504      return new RequestFormParam(req, name, sb.toString()).parser(parser);
505   }
506
507   /**
508    * Returns the form data parameter as the specified bean type.
509    *
510    * <p>
511    * Type must have a name specified via the {@link org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.FormData} annotation
512    * and a public constructor that takes in either <c>value</c> or <c>name,value</c> as strings.
513    *
514    * @param <T> The bean type to create.
515    * @param type The bean type to create.
516    * @return The bean, never <jk>null</jk>.
517    */
518   public <T> Optional<T> get(Class<T> type) {
519      ClassMeta<T> cm = req.getBeanSession().getClassMeta(type);
520      String name = HttpParts.getName(FORMDATA, cm).orElseThrow(()->new BasicRuntimeException("@FormData(name) not found on class {0}", className(type)));
521      return get(name).as(type);
522   }
523
524   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
525   // Other methods
526   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
527
528   /**
529    * Converts this object to a query string.
530    *
531    * <p>
532    * Returned query string does not start with <js>'?'</js>.
533    *
534    * @return A new query string, or an empty string if this object is empty.
535    */
536   public String asQueryString() {
537      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
538      for (RequestFormParam e : this) {
539         if (sb.length() > 0)
540            sb.append("&");
541         sb.append(urlEncode(e.getName())).append('=').append(urlEncode(e.getValue()));
542      }
543      return sb.toString();
544   }
545
546   /**
547    * Makes a copy of these parameters.
548    *
549    * @return A new parameters object.
550    */
551   public RequestFormParams copy() {
552      return new RequestFormParams(this);
553   }
554
555   private boolean eq(String s1, String s2) {
556      if (caseSensitive)
557         return Utils.eq(s1, s2);
558      return Utils.eqic(s1, s2);
559   }
560
561   @Override /* Object */
562   public String toString() {
563      JsonMap m = new JsonMap();
564      for (String n : getNames())
565         m.put(n, get(n).asString().orElse(null));
566      return m.asJson();
567   }
568}
